item.title: Micron Stock Hits Record High Before Christmas — Futurum Equities Says Market Is Repricing Firm Toward Durable AI Margins
item.description: The record high comes as investors reassess Micron’s positioning in the AI-driven memory market.

item.title: Netflix Pushes Back On TRC Capital’s Mini-Tender Bid At Below-Market Price
item.description: TRC is looking to purchase 1.25 million shares of Netflix common stock at a price of $91 per share in cash.

item.title: Omeros Stock Jumps Premarket After FDA Approves First Drug For Rare Transplant Complication — Retail Sees Big Upside
item.description: The drug was approved for use in adults and children aged two years and older.

item.title: Why Did AGIO Stock Surge 14% Today?
item.description: Agios Pharmaceuticals announced that the FDA approved its oral therapy for anemia in adults with alpha- or beta-thalassemia.
